Person.Organization: EMORY UNIVERSITYUNIVERSITY OF OKLAHOMA HLTH SCIENCES CTRUNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
The dataset(s) used for the analyses described in this manuscript were generated by “The Mood and Methylation Study (MMS)”, and were obtained from dbGaP found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap through dbGaP study accession numbers phs [will be provided]. This Dataset was provided by Jinying Zhao, M.D., Ph.D., and Eric Strachan, Ph.D. Jinying Zhao, M.D., Ph.D., Dr. Eric Strachan, and collaborators request that publications resulting from these data cite their original publications:
Zhu Y, Strachan E, Fowler E, Bacus T, Roy-Byrne P, Zhao J. Genome-wide profiling of DNA methylome and transcriptome in peripheral blood monocytes for major depression: A Monozygotic Discordant Twin Study. Transl Psychiatry. 2019 Sep 2;9(1):215. doi: 10.1038/s41398-019-0550-2. PMID: 31477685; PMCID: PMC6718674.
Strachan E, Zhao J, Roy-Byrne PP, Fowler E, Bacus T. Study Design and Rationale for the Mood and Methylation Study: A Platform for Multi-Omics Investigation of Depression in Twins. Twin Res Hum Genet. 2018 Dec;21(6):507-513. doi: 10.1017/thg.2018.64. Epub 2018 Nov 28. PMID: 30484417; PMCID: PMC8900145.
Support for the collection of the data sets was provided by Grant R01MH097018-01A1 awarded to Dr. Jinying Zhao and Dr. Eric Strachan through NIMH.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
